Definition: The task is to classify whether a given medical case report mentions the presence of an adverse drug reaction. An adverse drug reaction is a harmful or unpleasant reaction to a medical product that predicts hazard from future administration of the product. Classify your answers into non-adverse drug event and adverse drug event.
